detail_desc: Sleeveless dress in jersey made from a viscose blend with a print motif on the front, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with raw, roll edges around the sleeves and hem.
Short dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and 3/4-length sleeves with flared cuffs.
Thong briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey. Low waist with a wide, elastic waistband and a lined gusset.
Espadrilles in a cotton weave with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Top in airy linen jersey with a V-neck, button placket and butterfly sleeves.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with details in imitation suede, a loop at the back, decorative straps and a zip in the side. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 4 cm.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.
Pouch bag in grained imitation leather with a zip at the top. Size approx. 4x11x14.5 cm.

Set with a T-shirt, and pair of shorts with braces. T-shirt in cotton jersey with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with a small print detail at the top, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Piqué shorts with an elasticated waist, fake fly, side pockets, fake pocket with a flap and button at the front, fake pocket with a button at the back, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces.
Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and bum. Wrapover top, lightly padded cups and wide, adjustable shoulder straps.
Low-heeled shoes in imitation leather with lacing at the front and gently chiselled toes. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and chunky, patterned rubber soles.
Short coat in soft faux fur with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and side pockets. Lined.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Top in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a lined, wrapover hood, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a small appliqué at the hem.

Set with a vest top and shorts. Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and a print on one leg.
Blouse in an airy jacquard weave with a small frilled collar, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with slits and buttons at the cuffs.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered detail on the chest and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour in the inside of the collar and cuffs.

Soft, non-wired bra in ribbed microfibre designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.

Fully lined cargo trousers in soft, washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Flap front, back and leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and shaped, tapered legs. Jersey lining.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with a racer back and rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Fitted coat in soft bouclé with a zip down the front and patch pockets. Recycled polyester lining.
Scarf in checked weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.
Blouse in a linen and cotton weave with a collar, V-neck opening at the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring jersey waistband, side pockets and rounded hems.
A-line dress in airy seersucker with covered elastication at the top and shoulder straps with decorative ties.
Outdoor trousers in fast-drying functional fabric. Elasticated waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with a zip and ribbing at the hems.

Small fabric shoulder bag with print motifs on the front, a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap and a zip at the top. Foldover flap and an adjustable tab with a plastic fastener at the front. One outer compartment with a hook and loop fastener at the front, one zipped outer compartment at the back and one inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 3.5x16.5x20 cm.
Shorter lace top with cap sleeves and a concealed zip and slit at the back. Lined.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with a deep neckline with gathers at the top.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a print motif front and back.
Calf-length satin dress with a deep V-neck, wrapover front and concealed fastening at the sides. Long sleeves and wide cuffs with a slit and button. Softly draping and wider to the hem. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in soft stretch denim with worn details that are patched on the inside. Relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and tapered legs.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Slim legs with narrow hems.
Leggings in sturdy organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist. Soft brushed inside.
Fully-fashioned hi-tops with rubber details and a ribbed top edge. Mesh insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Soft glasses case with an opening on one short side. Size 8x17 cm.

Short dress in an airy weave with pin-tucks at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist, bell-shaped skirt, and lace details at the cuffs and hem. Jersey inner dress.
Fully lined swimsuit made partly from recycled polyester. Removable inserts and a frill trim that continues down the back.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a washed look. Roll-edged chest pocket and roll edges around the neckline and sleeves.
Sleeveless top in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a lace-trimmed V-neck and sewn-in wrapover. Elasticated seam below the bust and detachable twisted ties with tassels.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy, floral-print viscose weave with a V-neck and wrapover with buttons at the front.
Fitted T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline with a narrow ribbed trim.
Trainer socks in a pattern-knit cotton blend.

Set with a top, leggings and hairband in soft cotton. Sleeveless, A-line top in woven fabric with a flounce at the top that continues back over the shoulders, and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist. Hairband in jersey with a decorative bow at the front and elastication at the back.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim in a slightly looser fit. Regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Dungarees in soft stretch denim with adjustable straps with metal fasteners and buttons down the front. Small chest pocket, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and a small appliqué at the bottom.
Fully lined bikini top with triangular cups, removable inserts, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and ties at the back.
Short-sleeved top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.
Short-sleeved, fitted top in stretch, ribbed jersey.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted, double-breasted jacket in felted fabric with a high, stand-up collar, decorative stitching front and back, side pockets and a decorative tab at the cuffs. Lined.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with sewn-on ties at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Fitted, V-neck shirt in stretch poplin made from a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Tube scarf in soft faux fur.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Mesh linings and fabric insoles.
Long-sleeved polo shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, button placket and ribbed cuffs.
Dungarees in soft, washed denim with worn details, adjustable straps and press-studs at the sides. Chest pocket, side pockets, back pockets, a fake fly and gently tapered legs.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood, zip down the front, front pockets and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Soft pile lining.
Hipster briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather. Flap with a concealed magnetic fastener and decorative buckle and a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap with a metal fastener. One large compartment and a card compartment. Imitation leather lining. Depth 5 cm, height 9 cm, width 17 cm.
Dungarees in sweatshirt fabric made from soft organic cotton. Straps with press-studs, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Vest top in printed jersey with a racer back.
Jumper in a textured cotton-blend knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in soft cotton denim with elasticated ribbing at the waist, a fake fly and fake front pockets.
Jacquard-knit socks in a cotton blend with elasticated, roll-edge tops.
Hat in a soft fine knit with a sequined appliqué on the front, pompom on top, ribbed hem and earflaps. Fleece lining.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Regular waist with a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Nylon jacket with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck at the back and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with lace-trimmed, asymmetric cuffs, slits in the sides and a lace trim at the hem.
Leggings in ribbed organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
